description:
Nov 29-30: Saddletowne to McKnight-Westwinds (Single Tracking)

These stations will NOT be fully closed, this is a partial closure.

  • On Saturday, November 29, from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m., you will need to catch your train from the northeastbound side of the platform (toward Saddletowne) for travel in BOTH directions from the impacted stations.
  • On Sunday, November 30, from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m., you will need to use the westbound side of the platform (towards 69 Street) for BOTH directions of travel from these stations.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
